title: Digital Instructional Design for Improving Mass Measurement Estimation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic mass units (kg/g) and everyday object weights
context.additional_context: A process to enhance mass estimation skills through worked examples and scaffolding in a mobile learning environment utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Students can accurately estimate the mass of everyday objects within a 10% margin of error.
Students can infer the mass of new objects by comparing them with benchmarks (reference weights) and using comparative strategies.
Students can logically explain the mass estimation process with structured scaffolding support in a digital learning environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
